title: Diane Kruger and Norman Reedus are seen out separately
text:
Diane Kruger was spotted out for a stroll in New York City on Wednesday.

The Troy actress was seen pushing an empty baby stroller as it's likely a friend was carrying her daughter but was not photographed.

That same day, the blonde beauty's 50-year-old partner, Walking Dead actor Norman Reedus, was also seen as he ran errands that included a visit to a grocery store.

Mama in pink: Diane Kruger was spotted on a stroll in New York on Wednesday, at one point pushing a baby stroller that did not contain her daughter with Walking Dead's Norman Reedus

On the go: Kruger was seen in a black sailor's cap, pink hoodie, black leggings, and AMI Paris trainers for the outing

Kruger, 43, was seen in a black sailor's cap, pink hoodie, black leggings, and AMI Paris trainers for the outing.

At one point she wore white Wayfarer sunglasses over her eyes, and tucked her blond hair underneath her hat.

The German actress of Inglorious Basterds and National Treasure fame let her natural beauty shine in the crisp autumn weather, wearing no make-up.

The actor behind Daryl Dixon wore a nice cable knit grey sweater over a matching t-shirt, washed out grey pants and blue-grey shoes.

Papa in grey: Reedus was also seen in Manhattan on Wednesday, outside after doing some shopping at a grocery store

Last week, Diane shared a sweet snap of her 11-month-old to social media, whose name has yet to be released to the public, along with an adorable caption.

'My everything,' wrote the star, who stars in films in the US, France and Germany.

In the black and white shot, the blonde bombshell gazes at the camera while sitting in a field under a clouded sky.

Her everything: Last week, Diane shared a sweet snap of her 11-month-old to social media, along with an adorable caption

Her baby daughter is against her cheek, facing away from the camera.

She wears a striped knit top, with a bib around her neck.

Her mother is in white, wearing hoop earrings with a contented and wistful look on her face.

The In The Fade actress and her Walking Dead beau have remained extremely tight-lipped on their daughter's name, as well as protecting her face from being seen on social media.

As told to People Magazine, Diane's reasoning behind the decision is '“Well first and above all' about 'safety. We have The Walking Dead empire which has a lot of very intense fandomship that comes with it.'

She likes pink: The In The Fade actress and her beau have remained tight-lipped on their daughter's name and have yet to post a picture of her face to social media; seen here in April

'And secondly,' Kruger continued, 'she is an innocent, young, vulnerable baby and I think I just don’t understand why America doesn’t have better laws for children.'

Her partner Reedus also has a 20-year-old son, Mingus Lucien, whom he shares with his ex, supermodel Helena Christensen.

Diane and Norman officially went public with their relationship in March 2017, after having first met back in December 2015 while portraying lovers on the set of their film Sky.

At the time, Diane was still in a decade-long relationship with Dawson's Creek and Fringe star Joshua Jackson.

Cool couple: Diane and Norman officially went public with their relationship in March 2017; seen here earlier this month in New York

Stepping out: Norman stepped out while in New York looking sharp in a black suit

Keeping it casual: While he was sporting the black suit, he had on a pair of black headphones around his neck
description: Diane Kruger was spotted out for a stroll in New York City on Wednesday, at one point pushing a baby stroller that did not contain her daughter with Walking Dead actor Norman Reedus.
